name: Beyblade: Metal Saga
original_name: メタルファイト ベイブレード
overview: A new cast of characters take on the continued battle between good and evil. Ginga, our hero, and his group of loyal friends take on a dangerous group called the Dark Nebula. Dark Nebula’s mission is to take over the world and unleash their evil upon it; but before they can do so, they must destroy Ginga as he is the only person that’s strong enough to stand in their way. The plot thickens as friends become enemies and enemies become allies. Everything starts and ends with Ginga as he struggles to find the strength to defend his world and the honor of Beyblade.

seasons.name: Beyblade: Metal Fusion
seasons.overview:
A new cast of characters take on the continued battle between good and evil. Gingka, our hero, and his group of loyal friends take on a dangerous group called the Dark Nebula. The Dark Nebula’s mission is to take over the world and unleash their evil upon it; but before they can do so, they must destroy Gingka as he is the person strong enough to stand in their way. The plot thickens as friends become enemies and enemies become allies.

Everything starts and ends with Gingka as he struggles to find the strength to defend his world and the honour of BEYBLADE.

seasons.name: Beyblade: METAL MASTERS
seasons.overview:
The BEYBLADE challenge goes Global!

After defeating Ryuga and his dark Bey L-Drago, Gingka is crowned the winner of the BATLE BLADERS CHAMPIONSHIP. When news gets out, other bladers from around the world want their chance at defeating Gingka and capturing the title of #1 Blader. The WBBA, now headed by Ryo, calls a global competition enlisting top representatives from each country to compete. The BEYBLADE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP is announced and each country prepares to bring their best to the world stage. The competition brings together old friends, new rivalries and a whole new mix of BEYBLADES, tricks and strategies. Travel around the world and battle in never before seen Beystadiums. This time, the showdown is about more than a personal win, it’s about carrying on a nation’s pride. In 3…2…1…

seasons.name: Beyblade: METAL FURY
seasons.overview:
The non-stop action continues in the third chapter of Beyblade saga with Beyblade: Metal Fury.

This season promises more intense battles, brand new Beys with never before seen features and the shocking demise of a main character!

In Beyblade: Metal Fury, the key to earth’s salvation or destruction lies within 10 star fragments that empower its masters to fight for their chosen side. The possessors of these star fragments are called the legendary Bladers. Gingka discovers that he is one of these Legendary Bladers and journeys across five continents with his trusted friends on a hunt that will bring him face to face with the ultimate enemy.

Get ready for the intensity to rise in Beyblade: Metal Fury.

seasons.name: Beyblade: Shogun Steel
seasons.overview: It’s time for an ALL-NEW generation to battle it out in the action-packed story of BEYBLADE: Shogun Steel! The WBBA has worked tirelessly over the last 7 years to rebuild the BEYBLADE world by introducing a new Bey system and train the next generation of Bladers. Zyro Kurogane aspires to be just like Gingka and become the World’s Best Blader. With the help of his new friends, Zyro trains hard, gains strength and learns ground-breaking new battle techniques along the way! Unknowingly, there are mysterious and sinister powers at work with plots to take over the WBBA! Friends will battle each other and dark forces come out of the shadows, in and unprecedented event where totally strategic new combinations create EVEN MORE powerful NEW Beys! Will Zyro and his friends find the ultimate power and skill to become #1Blader, defeat the final boss and foil the mysterious power’s plot!?

episodes.name: Pegasus has Landed
episodes.overview: Gingka saves Kenta and is challenged to an uneven battle.

episodes.name: Leone's Roar!
episodes.overview: Madoka fights Kyoya with a broken bey Pegasus; Kyoya receives a strange visitor, who makes an enticing offer.

episodes.name: The Wolf's Ambition!
episodes.overview: Kenta challenges Gingka; Kyoya loses a battle and must leave with his opponent to train.

episodes.name: Charge! Bull Power
episodes.overview: Doji has a gift for Benkei, who later battles Gingka.

episodes.name: Vengeful Gasher
episodes.overview: Gingka is forced to battle a crab-obsessed villain who has kidnapped Madoka.

episodes.name: Aquario's Challenge
episodes.overview: Kenta poses as Gingka for a fight with Hikaru.

episodes.name: It's Our Special Move! Saggitario
episodes.overview: Benkei mentors Kenta, who wants a rematch with Hikaru; Madoka helps Kenta develop a special move.

episodes.name: Merci's Dangerous Trap
episodes.overview: Kyoya must prove himself during a challenge set up by Doji; Gingka thinks he's on a game show, but he's really being monitored by a computer.

episodes.name: Leone's Counterattack
episodes.overview: Kyoya battles Benkei; Gingka challenges Hikaru.

episodes.name: Heated Battle! Gingka Versus Kyoya
episodes.overview: Gingka battles Kyoya, who creates a tornado that rips through the city.

episodes.name: Chase the Wolf
episodes.overview: Gingka hunts for Doji at the Dark Nebula headquarters.

episodes.name: Infiltrate the Dark Nebula's Castle
episodes.overview: Merci sets traps for the gang inside the castle; Doji invites Gingka to join forces with him.

episodes.name: L-Drago Awakens!
episodes.overview: Gingka battles an old nemesis who uses Gingka's anger to fuel a forbidden bey.

episodes.name: Memories of Ryo
episodes.overview: Gingka's motivation for defeating Ryuga is revealed through a flashback focusing on his father.

episodes.name: Mysterious Hyoma
episodes.overview: The gang go after Gingka, who has decided to go home. The journey is perilous, and the group encounter a strange traveler along the way.

episodes.name: The Magnificent Aries
episodes.overview: Hyoma leads the gang to Gingka, but Kyoya is suspicious of Hyoma's intentions.

episodes.name: The Silver Pegasus
episodes.overview: Gingka searches for a scroll that could mean more power for Pegasus.

episodes.name: The Green Hades
episodes.overview: Gingka battles Hyoma---whom he's never been able to defeat---and uses his new power.

episodes.name: Conquer the Tag-Team Battle
episodes.overview: Benkei and Kenta team up for a tournament after learning to swap parts of their beys, which increases their power.

episodes.name: Begin! The Survival Battle!
episodes.overview: Gingka and friends enter the Survival Battle contest, in which the winner receives one wish. Meanwhile, Ryuga goes to a remote area and meets a powerful opponent.

episodes.name: The Road to the Battle Bladers
Clash! The Fireblaze vs The Pegasus
The Truth about Light and Darkness
